code:
makefile
# Configuration de base

# Base de données
MONGO_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/
MONGO_DB=gestion_projet
MONGO_USER=
MONGO_PASSWORD=

# Authentification
JWT_SECRET=my_secret_key
JWT_EXPIRE_IN=1h

# Application
PORT=3000
HOST=0.0.0.0

# Upload de fichiers
UPLOAD_DIR=uploads
MAX_FILE_SIZE=10MB

# Notifications en temps réel
SOCKET_IO_PORT=3001
SOCKET_IO_NAMESPACE=/notification
